instruction: Can the proposed methodology of using MRSI data and 1D-CNN models be considered superior to traditional methods in improving the assessment of treatment response in glioblastoma (GB)?
Output: Yes, the proposed methodology of using MRSI data and 1D-CNN models can be considered superior to traditional methods in improving the assessment of treatment response in glioblastoma (GB). The study found that the 1D-CNN models successfully identified different regions of tumors based on MRSI data, including normal brain, control/unresponsive tumor, and tumor responding to treatment. These models outperformed previous methods and provided accurate color-coded maps of the tumor regions. This suggests that the use of MRSI data and machine learning techniques can provide earlier hints of tumor relapsing stages and potentially improve therapy response assessment in GB.
